html:
System operation name and code

Description

Manage portal users "CanAdministratePortalUsers"

Permissions to add, modify and delete portal user accounts in the System Designer's user and role management sections.

Access to portal main page setup module "CanManagePortalMainPage"

Permission to set up the portal main page.
